author: M.J. Stallworth
text:
The RealReal was not completely clear on the condition of the item.  They said the item was in Very Good condition.  However, the stitching was loose in several places and will be need to be repaired and there was personalized stitching on the interior which was not mentioned.  Had I known the item would need repairs, I would have chosen another item.

On the other hand, shipping was quick.

In the end, I am less likely to trust The RealReal's assessment of an item's condition as it seems their standards are vastly different from mine.
title: The RealReal's assessment of condition doesn't match mine

author: customer
text: I bought a sale item that was supposed to be cashmere and in excellent condition.  It is not cashmere and has a small stain in front.  Since it was on sale, it is not returnable.  I will not order from the “RealReal” again.
